Because I’m really feeling a connection. Come join us and make this connection stronger in our collaborated event with ASUCR (ISC) this Friday. We’re hosting a valentines special love languages event and you could be the special one to win a GIFT CARD from us!! Link to the event is below!   https://ucr.zoom.us/j/92077579880 International Student Union at UCR November 5, 2020  ·  Hi guys!! Good luck to everyone who have midterms coming up! We’re having a game night this Friday through Discord  😊  Let’s chat and play some Among Us!! Hope to see you all there! See All Videos As we draw closer to ISU’s First Ever International Night, we will be highlighting all of our performers as “Performance Spotlight”. Our first Performance Spotlight goes to Senryu Taiko!!! 

We are Senryu Taiko, the premier Japanese drumming (taiko) group at UC Riverside. All of the members here at Senryu Taiko were drawn to the passion and intensity of taiko, and we enjoy playing and performing. We have performed all around campus and Southern California, and we are greatly involved in our local and greater community, being present in events such as the Riverside Lunar Festival, San Jose Obon, Anime Expo, Disneyland and much more. 

Senryu Taiko has many performances and workshops throughout the year and we greatly encourage you stay updated on our social media to learn about future events. You can follow us on social media on Facebook (Senryu Taiko), Instagram (@senryutaiko), and YouTube (Senryu Taiko). 

Stay tuned also for our official announcement for our 12th Annual Spring Concert coming soon! 9 ISU Coffee Hour 11 Be You with Us 12 See All See More
